page.title: 14A day in my life
page.content: At 7 o'clock get up.I wash and clean my teeth,then get dressed. I have my hair done and go downstairs for breakfast.I have cereal and toast. I pack my bag and put my coat on and go to school by car.School opens at 8.55 a.m. We have assembly first in the school hall during which we hear a story and sing a hymn. Then we have English and French.We go out to play for 15 mins. The teacher on duty claps her hands and we go in for maths. The infants go in first.At noon we eat our dinner in the hall.This is followed by 30 mins play. We either have art,history,science or games,sometimes music. We go home at 3.20 p.m. When I get home I change and ride my pony for an hour.I put him to bed and help my mummy with the tea. I read or watch television and go to bed.
